name: Hidden Object Chronicles: Poisoned Truth Collector's Edition
name_original: Hidden Object Chronicles: Poisoned Truth Collector's Edition
description:
Mark Mendelson was expecting a pleasant family get-together, but all he got was a lethal dose of champagne. You've been asked to find the killer. And you cannot fail! You'll be deep into family relations and learn all the secrets of the wealthy Mendelson clan. Who will inherit the fortune? Who did the head of the family quarrel with just a few hours before his abrupt death? Answer these questions and send the criminal to jail! Can you solve the perplexing case and ensure the guilty party faces the consequences? The challenge awaits in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 Family secrets!
Delve into intricate relationships, and decipher motives behind the murder. Will you identify the heir to the Mendelson fortune? Or reveal the untold rifts among family members that led to the fatal confrontation?

🔎 Reveal the truth!
Engage your mind with challenging yet captivating puzzles that promise rewards in the form of crucial clues and motives. Your mission: find the culprit and ensure justice prevails!

🔎 Bonus chapter!
Play the exclusive bonus chapter that peels back the layers of yet another captivating mystery within the family, unraveling more thrilling secrets! Focus solely on the pursuit of truth and justice without any hindrances!

🔎 Detective process!
Enjoy the detective experience without the usual bureaucratic distractions, immersing yourself fully in the thrill of solving the case. Your keen eye and sharp mind are indispensable in cracking this captivating mystery!
